Text:
Twentyforty,

Many many thanks for uploading this great movie again. Some Pieces of shit tried to defame you last time by hitting minus even before it was out 100%. I hope it doesnt happen this time. 

I can trust you blindly for your encodes and so shall others.
**Big Thumbs Up**

ALL:

People who have downloaded first upping of this torrent, can finish the download by:
-stopping and removing the old one from queue - DO NOT delete the data - just the torrent.
- loading and starting this one

Your torrent program would "see" the presence of existing files (of course, download location must be the same).

People who have 100% can do the same and help to seed.

@twentyforty
Can you please upload

@twentyforty: I did not have to remove and load it again. It automatically resumed from there, when you upped it again. DL completed and seeding for long started. Will share at least 3 or 4 times.

@dark_defender: Each torrent differs in hash-sum. If you have not loaded This torrent - you would seed just to the ones who haven't finished download using the old torrent - and then - you'll be seeding to no one. Good luck. Shit I wrote I wrote with purpose.
@twentyforty: Oh, i dint know that. Well now i will remove it from seeding & load it again and then seed. Thanks for telling me.
